Reviews.Title: Colorful eye catching app, but  Don't waste your time.
Reviews.Author: lea
Reviews.Content: The description given for this app is that you can view full movies and episodes of tv shows. NOT!  All it mostly does is provide 2 or 3 minute clips. The clips are narrated by a narrator and you do not hear the characters, the narrator tells you what is happening such as on soap operas. My suggestion is that you not bother with this. Don't waste your time.

Reviews.Title: Flash player needed for Tv Online
Reviews.Author: Robin Hudson
Reviews.Content: I downloaded this hoping to watch tv, when my husband is watching something I do not want to. But looks like you need a flash player to do so. So I am trying to figure out how to download a flash player, I understand that adobe flash player does not work on kindle fire. Wish I had known that before I bought the fire.

Reviews.Title: Great app
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Grace Melby
Reviews.Content: It's a good app that allows you to easily access websites that you can watch tv shows on and the only problem I had was that there was a very limited selection of movies but you can go on Netflix or hulu to watch movies and this app head a several tv shows that aren't on either

Reviews.Title: My soap opra
Reviews.Author: Donna M. Dicicco
Reviews.Content: I watch Days of our lives on this when I'm not home to catch it. I may have to wait til the next day to see it but @least I can I love my story but their are other tv programs on this also I'm just saying what I use it for & so can anyone that can't be home to catch their show just gotta wait til next day. Thank you Donna D.

Reviews.Title: Are you kidding me?
Reviews.Author: AndreDP
Reviews.Content: It sucks!  It may be one of the better TV viewing apps for America; but I expected more.  USTV and Radio free is much better.

Reviews.Title: well
Reviews.Author: megablesd
Reviews.Content: When the links work its an awesome thing! you cant beat it! so how can you complain? Its just time consuming to actually find something that actually works

Reviews.Title: tv online doesnt work on the android
Reviews.Author: alaina
Reviews.Content: I do not like this app at all. It is horrible to try to get it working.it is so nasty.

Reviews.Title: TV on the go
Reviews.Author: bonnie smallfoot
Reviews.Content: Was amazed of all the movies and TV shows you can watch on the go thank you so much !!

Reviews.Title: Very good TV with a great picture and good color tones
Reviews.Author: Charles G. Gage "CGGage"
Reviews.Content: The TV certainly has many features and is easy to use.  I was astounded at the internet connectivity and how my cellphone automatically asked if I wanted to show a YouTube video on the TV instead of the phone.  The TV and cellphone are connected to my WiFi and somehow the two were aware of each other - I did nothing to setup this feature.It took awhile to get the color tones right.  Some news programs are too bright and it all seems to be based upon the program as to whether the color/brightness consistency can be maintained.  There are no buttons on the TV at all.  Everything is controlled by remote.I like the TV and would purchase it again.

Reviews.Title: watch missed shows
Reviews.Author: Linda F
Reviews.Content: I can watch shows that I have missed on the major channels like, nbc It may take a few days for the episode toappear on app but it is all free.

Reviews.Title: limited
Reviews.Author: Heatherette.
Reviews.Content: Not a very good selection. And for those complaining about the kindle not running flash... well no tablet runs flash. Blame Adobe.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: It just takes me to the network website, I still need to have a media player which kindle doesn't support for me to watch my shows.

Reviews.Title: TV Online. Do you really need a set top box anymore?
Reviews.Author: Micael Vitt
Reviews.Content: Let's face it. Cable TV has become Internet Streaming TV. I purchased this app for free on my Kindle HD Fire 7". It gets all your favorite network TV series and movies. At present, I am watching the Michael Fox Show on my Kindle as I watch this. The series about the bed bugs. TV Online as all full episodes and every season. No need to go out and buy the blu-rays discs. The picture quality is great. I am going to try my Toshiba Windows 8.1 with a HDMI output. TV Online has The Office, Big Bang Theory, Two and a Half Men, to name a few. My objective: TV Online, totally free, is going to help cut my cable ridiculous bill. With Amazon prime, I have TV and movies for free. All this month on Amazon Video in Parenthood, for free. With TV Online, all I can say is watch out cable, we are coming down the line. TV Online is great and the picture quality is fantastic on your Kindle, computer or HDTV. Could it be the end of renting 100x over set-top boxes. What a scam. Amazon and TV Online is on your side. Get it quick.

Reviews.Title: Waste of time
Reviews.Author: jennianddan
Reviews.Content: I only downloaded this app to watch The Blacklist that I missed for bad weather.  But it only has partial episodes of The Blacklist.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: LINDA "Linda R. Schry"
Reviews.Content: i dont even know the purpose of this because i couldnt find anything popular unless i was doing something wrong.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: kateria
Reviews.Content: Well I thought that I can watch tv on my tablet but you have to have an cable box for that but I don't

Reviews.Title: don't get for kindle fire hd
Reviews.Author: Susan Oyer
Reviews.Content: Got this to watch shows on my kindle fire hd.  It uses adobe flash which doesn't work on the kindle fire hd, so worthless.Hopefully it works on other tablets, but don't waste your time if you have the kindle fire hd.

Reviews.Title: Works pretty well - only some public shows are not in the menu.
Reviews.Author: Josef Bartos
Reviews.Content: Works pretty well - only some public shows are not in the menu. Many shows are accessible using with the Experimental streaming viewer in good quality.

Reviews.Title: Just Didn't Like It
Reviews.Author: WJW
Reviews.Content: The selection just seems not to be that great for me. Some may like it, but I do not. If it is free you can try it and find out for yourself!

Reviews.Title: WORST APP EVER
Reviews.Author: lucas
Reviews.Content: I HATE this app!! it doesn't show whole shows!!! I would give it 0 stars if I could!! this app is soliloquy stupid!!

Reviews.Title: awful

Reviews.Content: Awful uninstalled it wouldn't  even rate it  a 1 it did not work right and had crappy choice but you just keep looking

Reviews.Content: It has a variety of programs to chose from.  The ones I viewed were current.  You can catchup just like "On Demand".

Reviews.Title: I watch is all the time

Reviews.Content: I watch it all of the time.  It has lots of choices of videos and tv programs to watch and enjoy

Reviews.Title: Missing some shows/networks
Reviews.Author: Jay@law
Reviews.Content: I love the Impractical Jokers. Although,I don't have time to watch it at home. So today I downloaded this app so I could watch it on the go. I clicked on "shows" and searched for "Impractical Jokers". It wasn't listed. Then,i went to "networks" and searched for "Tru Tv". That wasn't listed either. So yeah.....i had second thoughts on this app.

Reviews.Title: it says I have it but it never downloaded.
Reviews.Author: Deanna
Reviews.Content: This app claims I downloaded it but it is nowheres to be found. Who knows I was hopeful but thevapp sucks.

Reviews.Title: Just got it.

Reviews.Content: Haven't used it to much yet. Just  Haven't used it to much in my tablet, but look I to it.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Vennise Johnson "Chips7"
Reviews.Content: love it love it lovei i cant say anything more I have enjoyed it every day wish I knew about it sooner

Reviews.Title: Say what?
Reviews.Author: Debdeb
Reviews.Content: Once again could not stream. Needed adobe tried to install I got some message cannot download at this time. Tried three times I just gave up.

Reviews.Title: TV Online
Reviews.Author: bo
Reviews.Content: TV Online  just did not work for me, just not worth the time to play with there are other app. out there that are better.

Reviews.Title: ok does not stand up to some other apps
Reviews.Author: Damion Harris
Reviews.Content: It is a ok app crashed a couple times and then wanted fees for certain shows does not stand up to apps like yido or movie maze or even crackle about the same as USTV so if you r looking for free entertainment and this is the only app you can get then grab it if you want something better fallow my list above that is the order of my favs and they are all free enjoy

Reviews.Title: TV online the app that doesn't work

Reviews.Content: t_v online does not work it won't show me TV shows only clips and stuff about the TV shows I can get that online without the app one of the worst apps ever won't ever get it again

Reviews.Content: As the cliche goes,  "This totaly sucks!"  You can't watch anything with this app; or at least I can't. Really!

Reviews.Author: TinkaAngel2
Reviews.Content: :) I'm typing this because they said to..... not sure why we have to, just that we do! 1 2

Reviews.Title: ok...

Reviews.Content: This app is ok...it will help you find the shows you are looking to watch and bring you to the site they live on. It does make it so you don't have to search yourself, but that is all it does.

Reviews.Title: tv online
Reviews.Author: dee stanley
Reviews.Content: great except must purchase a online acc. with dish / direct/ or other company to watch but you can take your tv everywhere...

Reviews.Content: there are to many channels that won't work on too many devices it's a app that is extremely limited. please update to work with all devices

Reviews.Title: TV Online

Reviews.Content: I was not impressed.  I have Direct TV and Netflix and app channels for each station I like to watch.  This is a useless app.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: no names "Lime"
Reviews.Content: I like this product very much.This product was easy to install and easy setup.I would recommend this product to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice way to catch up on what you missed!
Reviews.Author: Richard Rivera
Reviews.Content: Easy to select from and start enjoying the content that you want.  I will use it quite often. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: No DVR?
Reviews.Author: J. Loniello "Julie Jewel"

Reviews.Content: This is outstanding, great selection of offerings.  Presentation is clear, easy to start, good sound, easy to view.  Really enjoy this feature

Reviews.Title: pleased

Reviews.Content: works good. very simple to use. I would purchase again. Very pleased with this product and would purchase it again. satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: it's not that good a product. Might want to get a different app.

Reviews.Title: Having it my way.

Reviews.Content: So many choices in all genres. And with Prime the majority of shows are free.  It's never been easier to haveso much content available ---my way.

Reviews.Content: wish it would work as advertized totally uselessneeds flash is just plain lackingneeds needs a lot of help

Reviews.Title: ooooooh?!?!?!?!

Reviews.Title: Easy

Reviews.Content: Great way to see the programs you would have missed. I find that while sitting in a doctors office that time actually passes very quickly when you can watch a show that interests you personally, instead of what everyone is watching on the office TV.So I find this App very enjoyable and relaxing, wherever I am.

Reviews.Title: not happy with it

Reviews.Author: Name withheld because stalkers Google me and ...
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work without Adobe Flash.  Adobe Flash not available for Kindle.  Why bother making the app available?  What's Adobe's problem that they don't make it available for iPhone or Kindle?

Reviews.Title: it sucks
Reviews.Author: Cherylann
Reviews.Content: Very choppy, wouldn't play with out freezing. I tried it on my kindle as well as on my I phone and had the same problems

Reviews.Title: A promising idea, but the bugs have to be worked out.
Reviews.Author: James D Wilets
Reviews.Content: The problem with this program is that it is very difficult to use, and there are still a lot of bugs in it.  In the middle of one movie, the move read an error message and I had to re-enter the paid for movie a bit later.  It's also much more difficult to access and navigate than Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Generally Speaking a
Reviews.Author: Steve1223
Reviews.Content: If you are inclined to enjoy the genre being offered this is a good program and you will enjoyusing it. It did not appeal to me as the content available was not to my liking.I gave it a 3 staronly due to my looking for something that the program cannot provide at this time.

Reviews.Title: TV Online
Reviews.Author: Karen Dane
Reviews.Content: I had to remove from kindle due to not being able to load adobe reader.  I would love to find an app that allowsnme to watch my favorite shows.  The CW has been able to be successful with this.

Reviews.Title: Good app
Reviews.Author: David S
Reviews.Content: Flash player works good on kindle fire. You can get flash player app from [...]  Go to archive and choose flash player for android.

Reviews.Title: Ok

Reviews.Title: Malware alert
Reviews.Author: w. charlieround

Reviews.Title: Seems good

Reviews.Title: Clip case works fine.

Reviews.Content: The product is great except there is no hole in clip case for the camera. I drilled one myself, Ok heavy duty

Reviews.Title: Difficult to watch
Reviews.Author: Melissa Hall
Reviews.Content: A very Poor app for the kindle fire.  Stops constantly, sound and video are off, ads are numerous and long.

Reviews.Title: Just like Crackle
Reviews.Author: Adam J Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: This app gives you a listing of everything seeded through the internet databases for whatever movie you are looking for.  Great if you have access to other paying sites such as HULU, Netflix, Cable subscriptions, etc.  Not a good app if you are looking for something to watch without paying other services.

Reviews.Title: supposed to have loaded?
Reviews.Author: David H
Reviews.Content: So many of these apps indicate they have successfully loaded only to find no such luck.  This was one of them.  One good looking free tv app, loaded, then would most of the time give a default message claiming site too busy to open, "try later".  This an evolving technology and still has a considerable way to go.

Reviews.Title: I'm having trouble with live streaming.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Rosebud"
Reviews.Content: Watching previously aired shows can be choppy. There is definitely room for improvement. I'm sure this will change and get better and I'm hoping soon.

Reviews.Title: crap app

Reviews.Content: TV Online i love it you have avery channel on it.i think anyone will love it also.  you do have to read what to do for ti at the buttum .

Reviews.Author: Candy W. "Candy W."
Reviews.Content: Love the variety of programs to watch..good app for true movie buffs. Large catagory of programs for all ages. Nice when traveling. Good connection. No buffering.

Reviews.Title: Handy

Reviews.Title: BOO

Reviews.Author: Yolanda
Reviews.Content: App fails to connect far more often than succeeds. Both Netflix and You Tube connect almost 100% of the time, Hulu plus returns unable to contact server 80+% of the time. Error is instant and without a retry option.

Reviews.Content: I had a horrible time getting it to work on my kindle fire. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. it just didn't work at all.

Reviews.Title: Poor

Reviews.Title: Not good for me

Reviews.Content: The app will not  run on an Acer Iconia.  But one doesn't know that until you've already downloaded the thing.

Reviews.Title: TV Online

Reviews.Title: TV online...

Reviews.Title: TV Online app

Reviews.Title: works ok most of the time,
Reviews.Author: Jim McCann
Reviews.Content: There is a hit or miss unpredictably using this ap. When it works,  I love it. When it stalls and crashes, it's a source of considerable frustration.

Reviews.Title: Tv Online
Reviews.Author: Snickers
Reviews.Content: I installed this and then I uninstalled it, It did not work for me very well at all.  Thank you Amazon for letting me try it.

Reviews.Title: very old shows

Reviews.Content: not worth downloading it has old shows but not what i like  waste of download i don't even use it

Reviews.Title: not bad.

Reviews.Content: Almost as good as regular hulu but some programs are not readily available to view the next day as with hulu plus , still not bad though.

Reviews.Title: Terrible app
Reviews.Author: Anne
Reviews.Content: It was useless. No full episodes of anything worth watching.  I uninstalled after one use. Lousy. Never again. Why can't anyone make a tv app that works?

Reviews.Title: hated it
Reviews.Author: I didn't like it at all the only shows were t...
Reviews.Content: I didn't  like it at all the only show  they had were the ones nobody watches don't waste your time

Reviews.Title: This app needs a Flash Player for Kindle
Reviews.Author: RFK "RFK"
Reviews.Content: It is a nice idea for an app.  However, My kindle Fire does not support a flash player and it is needed to use this app.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work on Kindle
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Walters
Reviews.Content: This needs adobe Flash which doesn't work on Kindle. Don't waste your time downloading it. Amazon needs to remove it.

Reviews.Title: still learning
Reviews.Author: just my opinion
Reviews.Content: I am not sure how easy this will be or how much i will using it, but seems to be something we may use often

Reviews.Title: Great App!
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: I get to watch my favorite shows like The Bold and Beautiful and the Good Wife! Thank goodness for CBS!

Reviews.Title: TV Online
Reviews.Author: B. Moncrief
Reviews.Content: As good a TV App as any. Just a little something to pass or kill the time. Did I say it was free?

Reviews.Title: I really like this one
Reviews.Author: Alan Rhodes
Reviews.Content: It is straight forward gives you a 1 to five 1 beingForget it you are not watching nothing here- Toa 5 for you can watch a full episode.Going to the website is better but this app packages it all wellSo yea.

Reviews.Title: TERRIFIC!!!!!
Reviews.Author: k_tree
Reviews.Content: This app does just what it says it will.  I connect my Kindle Fire HD to my bedroom TV (where I do not have cable) and watch some great TV (when I'm not watching Amazon Prime Movies or Videos) !!!!!  I highly recommend this app!

Reviews.Title: Not a Functioning App.
Reviews.Author: Phancy Self "Phancy"
Reviews.Content: Tried several times and different programing.  Received a message indicating programing was not available.  I would not recommend it.  I would use my Dish Anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Pinstripe KING
Reviews.Content: Not worth the time.  Has a lot of  holes that need to be plugged up.  what's the point in getting the free networks when you can go to there sites.

Reviews.Title: Don't Like
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Just not my type. There are easier ways for me to find the programs I would like to watch. But that's just me.

Reviews.Title: only for kindle hd
Reviews.Author: OutstandingJewel
Reviews.Content: i think its only for kindle hd. i would have left  it blank if i could. other than that problem i guess it would have been great

Reviews.Title: This isn't TV Online!
Reviews.Author: Clay Lifto
Reviews.Content: Clips, pieces, advertising. Can't I even get an entire program - even one episode? Nope. Trash. -Clay Lifto (author of "Only a Soldier Understands")

Reviews.Title: TV Review
Reviews.Author: beverly bass
Reviews.Content: It's not nearly as good as I thought it would be.....very few shows that interest me.....to be honest I can get Netflix easier & cheaper than your service especially if your Prime membership goes up.

Reviews.Title: Old Movies and TV
Reviews.Author: Ronald D. Carrington "Grumpy_Troll"
Reviews.Content: Good app, works well,  but not my cup of tea. Sorry.  You have to try some apps to find out if it works for you.  somebody out there must like it, you might too.

Reviews.Title: Useless
Reviews.Author: pam
Reviews.Content: Too bad there are not any channels worth watching. Looks impressive, but that is all. Don't waste your time. Useless.

Reviews.Title: good app
Reviews.Author: Paula Bowler
Reviews.Content: Works well tv programs are new and  play in full  movies are decent and also play well  I enjoy using this

Reviews.Title: even free is overpaid!
Reviews.Author: ruthlmut
Reviews.Content: even free is overpaid for this app. It is pretty much useless. I immediately uninstalled it after only one use.

Reviews.Title: not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Jerome A. Anderson
Reviews.Content: The app works well but it is just a venue that searches for our item and that wasn't what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Free
Reviews.Author: Barbara S Althaus
Reviews.Content: Pretty good for free tv. I was hopeful that this app would be good and it is!  Free tv is the way to go!

Reviews.Title: I have not used it yet.  I was looking for channel 2 ktuv was unable to find.
Reviews.Author: Penny Britton
Reviews.Content: I was looking for the football game on channel 2 and channel 5 and was unable to find.  Please advise how to use this app.

Reviews.Title: Failed download
Reviews.Author: JRM
Reviews.Content: Since I can't get Adobe Flash Player to download on my Kindle Fire, I can' use it.  Don't know what the problem is.

Reviews.Title: Good Apps!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Unruh
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed the Alarm App a lot. It is better than the one that came on my phone.Good App

Reviews.Title: Programs
Reviews.Author: glorialk
Reviews.Content: Saves time when its all in one area. Great program to check things out-need to make more use of it

Reviews.Title: dont like
Reviews.Author: daniel sevesind
Reviews.Content: tried to use it but had trouble using it so I took it off my kindle and looked for another app

Reviews.Title: Limited benefits in certain parts of the world
Reviews.Author: Mark H Wykoff
Reviews.Content: I was wanting to use it while in Qatar.  A lot of the selections were blocked for the regional access.

Reviews.Title: This app works for me
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: I think it is great . The app works fine.It is free so you watch what is available.This is a tv app that I will use.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: ...that I am unable to access some programs like Criminal minds because of different software that is used.  Very disappointing!~

Reviews.Title: Gathering dust...so to speak!
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Lewakowski
Reviews.Content: I used the application just once or twice since downloading it a month ago. I didn't find it real easy to navigate. I pride myself in being fairly quick to pick up the concepts of the various apps. This app. wasnt for me!

Reviews.Title: useless with my Samsung galaxy s4
Reviews.Author: jens4jesus
Reviews.Content: Tried a few shows, I was directed to the original network.  So far, abc and fox do not support my phone.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Nizzy
Reviews.Content: This app is good. I have it on my kindle fire hd, and its pretty good. The problem is you can't skip commercials and it sometimes pauses and has limited shows. Has full videos and smaller ones too. Works awesome for NCIS.

Reviews.Title: Still under Review
Reviews.Author: Paula A Moisan
Reviews.Content: I have so many new apps that I am still figuring this one out. I am sure it will be fine.

Reviews.Title: Sucks!
Reviews.Author: Daven "Davenick69"
Reviews.Content: Sucks bigtime. Most of the links don't work. Waste fo time! Use Netflix or Hulu instead, you will get much more.

Reviews.Title: Not what I thought it was...
Reviews.Author: Frances Duran "Francesca"
Reviews.Content: Not what I thought it was I was very disappointed.  I will be removing this off my kindle fire.  Not to happy!

Reviews.Title: what is it
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Trost "sandy t"
Reviews.Content: Can not get it to work, tells me to down load java but it will not load. I have other sites that I love I want this one to work to????

Reviews.Title: This is not a good app
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This app does not work, not worth any effort put in by the user. I don't think the developer is evil or anything, he is just not really putting out a useful product

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected...
Reviews.Author: et24
Reviews.Content: It's an app that compiles all of the links for a variety of TV shows. I wanted to be able to watch the TV show(s) within the app.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad app...
Reviews.Author: SamusLife
Reviews.Content: Not a bad app for what it does. You have to weed through a lot to get at what you want. If you have the time to waste and need entertained it's not a bad app to try filling those needs.

Reviews.Title: I can use this at night when I can't sleep
Reviews.Author: Maureen F Walker
Reviews.Content: I like the idea that if I can't sleep I can watch some TV.  I wish they were able to go back futher in programs though.

Reviews.Title: This is great to watch missed episodes
Reviews.Author: Linda Ellis
Reviews.Content: This helps me catch up on missed weekly episodes, I really enjoyed watching my other shows that are in the same time slots that I have my favorite show. This makes it easy to have and enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Waste
Reviews.Author: Kheidi
Reviews.Content: A waste of time from the first touch.  Offered nothing that was not more easily accessed somewhere else.  Delete asap

Reviews.Title: I like the idea of it, but haven't had time to use it.
Reviews.Author: Aurelia L. Hawkins
Reviews.Content: As I said above, the idea is great but I need to find the time to use it.  Maybe I can, eventually.

Reviews.Title: very helpful
Reviews.Author: patricia
Reviews.Content: can hat shows when traveing allso can watch news from home - like to keep on top of news and shows

Reviews.Title: TV online
Reviews.Author: Nikley
Reviews.Content: Most of the channels/programs wouldn't play.  Not worth the money, especially if you already have Netflix, Hulu plus or YouTube.Doesn't work on all devices..

Reviews.Title: One of my favorite shows ever...
Reviews.Author: Teresa Hodge
Reviews.Content: The casting in this show makes it a one of a kind, where as we see scientists in their true nature and yet it does not come of a scripted or fake.

Reviews.Title: Good so far.
Reviews.Author: Cher Bear
Reviews.Content: Goo so far.  Have not been able to connect wit a PC. Just using a Kendal fire HD. And not able to connect to a TV yet.

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: David Alan Richard
Reviews.Content: Could help if your looking to cut the cable but they just removed nbc channel sure more will follow for copy right vocations

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Marcia Hansen
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it that much, but not really what I expected.  I probably need to try and use it more.

Reviews.Title: This was a joke!
Reviews.Author: Capricorn "Capricorn"
Reviews.Content: I can't believe Amazon picked this as a free app of the day. It was pure garbage. If you are looking for TV shows to stream, there are better resources than this!

Reviews.Title: i got it
Reviews.Author: duncanhaus
Reviews.Content: Umm...When I Got it, the tape on the box was partly open. But the packaging in the box...I am glad there was no damage to the product.But the packaging was on the tops of the parcels in the box. Nothing was under the box on the bottom - the HDTV.For future reference, please make sure that there is protective packaging under the item placed first into the box - instead of nothing but the outer box for protection.
